definition: to take office/to assume a post

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
office/duty
to swear the oath of office
inauguration
inaugural speech
inaugural lecture

sentences.english: May, who took office earlier this month, is the starkest proponent of this.
sentences.chinese: 本月初就职的梅是这种观念最鲜明的倡导者。

sentences.english: The ambassador-designate will assume duty next month.
sentences.chinese: 这位派定的大使将在下个月就职。

sentences.english: Japan's new foreign minister sworn in .
sentences.chinese: 日本新外相松本刚明宣誓就职。

sentences.english: My aim when I took office was to make sure our resources were used responsibly and effectively.
sentences.chinese: 我就职时的目的是保证负责和有效地使用我们的资源。

sentences.english: I work as a network and systems administrator for a mid-sized company.
sentences.chinese: 我就职于一家中型企业担任网络和系统管理员工作。

sentences.english: You can almost guarantee that these will be revisited for the next instalment.
sentences.chinese: 你能几乎保证这些将会为下就职被再访。

sentences.english: And stop with the off-topic arguments and swearing.
sentences.chinese: 和停止题外话参数并宣誓就职。

sentences.english: But foreign wars don't wait for Washington inaugurations.
sentences.chinese: 但是国外的战争是不会等待华盛顿的就职仪式。

sentences.english: Since he took office in 2003, absolute poverty has dropped markedly.
sentences.chinese: 自他2003年就职以来，绝对贫困已经显著下降。

sentences.english: The United States inaugurates its President in January.
sentences.chinese: 美国于元月份为其总统举行就职仪式。

sentences.english: American presidents' inaugural addresses (APIA) represent the characteristics of the typical formal address.
sentences.chinese: 美国总统就职演说代表了正式演说的典型特点。

sentences.english: The inaugurate parade was still going on.
sentences.chinese: 当时就职典礼正在举行。

sentences.english: A crowd of great magnitude attended the President's inauguration.
sentences.chinese: 数以万记的人参加了总统的就职典礼。

sentences.english: The inauguration was a big event.
He has also held positions at Salomon Brothers Inc. and the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: 他也曾在所罗门兄弟公司和世界银行就职。

sentences.english: American presidential inaugural address is a-sub-component of the public political speaking.
sentences.chinese: 美国总统就职演说是政治演讲的一种。
